name: Rotatio (itch) (Gaindeez)
description:
Rotatio, a game about rotation!

Help the small Geo's get through their respective biomes.
Avoid dangerous spikes, balance heavy crates and use the power of gravity to your advantage!

Goodluck and have fun!

- Assets used -
ART: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/abstract-platformer
Music: https://opengameart.org/content/red-doors-v20
Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/win-sound-1
